thread.section_title: eCompanies Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eCompanies | www.ecompanies.com.au
thread.title: Wayne Lather

author: Wayne Lather
title: Wayne Lather
text:
Wow! Cant believe how simple that was!
Probably spent ten minutes tops and within the hour, had a new company set up and ready to go.
The majority of the cost was the ASIC fee that I would spend anyway so only cost $50 to get all the hard work done.
Unfortunately I didn't opt for also doing the ABN/TFN/GST/PAYG for another $50. I had done this myself for previous companies so thought I would do the same - then spent the rest of the morning pulling my hair out with government websites that are not designed to be simple. I still haven't got everything resolved with them! In hindsight, I wish I had taken the option of doing this with eCompanies.
Very happy with the system at eCompanies.
